page.title: 06Recreation in Bredfield
page.content: There is an amateur dramatic group in Bredfield called the "B.A.D.S." There are also other clubs and groups which hold their meetings in the village hall. These are Bredfield and District Community Council, the Parochial Church Council, the Women's Institute, the Mothers' Union, the Ladies' Group, the Over Sixties' Club, the Youth Club, the Mother and Toddler Club and the Indoor Bowls Club. Others use the courts and pitches out on the field like the Bredfield and District Tennis Club, the Football team and the Bowls Club. The membership is drawn from the whole area and sometimes as far away as Woodbridge but all are well supported.
